sticker_success_1: You will receive your stickers in 1 to 2 weeks. While you wait, try to think of a good spot to put your stickers!
sticker_success_list_1: in public where people will see them
sticker_success_list_2: in places that are unlikely to be removed quickly (the stickers don't cause any permanent damage)
sticker_success_list_3: on surfaces they will stick to easily (metal, plastic, glass)
sticker_success_list_4: NOT on private property, covering signage, ATMs, or gas pumps
sticker_success_3: Want to see where other people are putting their stickers?
